Welcome to ConfigBuddy's documentation!
====================================

ConfigBuddy is a powerful Python library for managing configuration files with elegance! 🎨

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   quickstart
   cli
   api
   contributing
   changelog

Features
--------

- 📝 Multiple format support (YAML, JSON, INI)
- 🔍 Smart configuration comparison and visualization
- 🔄 Intelligent configuration merging
- ✅ JSON Schema validation
- 🌳 Tree-style visualization

Getting Started
--------------

Check out our :doc:`quickstart` guide to get started with ConfigBuddy!
